title: Volunteers Needed
description: The NCLL needs volunteers in almost all divisions - managers, coaches, concessions, etc. Please follow the "Volunteer" link in the upper-right corner of any page or on the sidebar of this page and the "Reference" page.

title: Bat Changes
description: All bats used in Little League baseball games and practices must meet USA Bat Standards (metal bats that do not meet this standard will not be allowed for use this season): https://www.littleleague.org/playing-rules/bat-information/

title: Opening Day
description: Opening Day - Please join us in our league-wide parade and first pitch ceremony. Raffles, food, baseball and softball games, and family fun will be enjoyed at Rothermel Park.

title: Juniors League
description: We're looking for any interested 13-14 year old boys to join our Juniors League team. Please contact us for more information.
